question: You have a full-time job and you are also doing a part-time evening course.You now find that you cannot continue the course.Write a letter to your teachers. In your letterdescribe the situationexplain why you cannot continue at this timesay what action you would like to take
text: I am writing this letter to inform you about not to attend a part-time evening course.

I am one of the students who is taking evening classes and side by side also have a full-time activity. Since my operation timing has been changed from morning to evening time that's why it is very hard for me to continue my course. This work is really important for me to support my family.

In this situation, I request you to refund my half of the fees so that I could spend on some valuable resources as I am one who has all the responsibilities to run my home. This post I found after so many efforts so, I could not leave this task in any type of condition. So, kindly try to understand this situation and help me in my difficult time to refund me some amount back in my credit card.
I hope you understand my problem and my request would be solved. I would also happy to hear back from you.
